ygData.subject: Re: Exp gain while in parties.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Some classes do have exp penalties.  Paladins and SK s do, and I think also Rangers. ... From: Gregory Egan  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Some classes do have exp penalties. Paladins and SK's do, and I think also
Rangers.
----- Original Message -----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 3:03 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Exp gain while in parties.....


> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>
> Going up levels is race dependent, with humans going up fastest. I am a
> human wizard and I went up half a level in about one to one and a half
> hours of killing giant spiders in west Karana in a mixed group, so I don't
> think it has to do with being a wizard.
>
> Greg (Kronan)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> To unsubscribe from this mailing list, or to change your subscription
> to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
>
